comment.author: 43264265@N00
comment._content: misspelled by photographer. Actually John Hays Hammond, (31 March 1855 – 8 June 1936) was a famous mining engineer, diplomat, and philanthropist.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Dan4th: Thanks for the tip! It does appear that Mr. Hammond 's middle name was Hays instead of Hayes. We’ll need to change the source data so that we can keep the information we show here in Flickr and in our own catalog ( http://www.loc.gov/rr/print/catalog.html ) in sync.
